# Dance of Ruin (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], Demonologist 2, [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 full round

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** Spread centered on caster

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 90

To cast this spell, the caster dances wildly and chants. After she finishes her dance, a wave of crackling energy flashes outward up to the extent of the range. All nondemon creatures within the area take 2d20 points of damage.
